items.sentence: I have a lot of things that I need to do today.
I heard Tom and Mary were going to get married.
I think we should tell Tom he needs to do that.
I don't know if Tom will tell the truth or not.
Mrs. Roland, what do you think of this problem?
The world could use a lot more people like Tom.
You don't need to tell me if you don't want to.
Tom has been friends with Mary for a long time.
Tom froze like a deer caught in the headlights.
Tom fell through the ice into the frigid water.
